```{r echo=TRUE}
data <- read.csv('C:/Users/USER/Dropbox/R-work/vis/day3/request/Current dollars.csv')
head(data)

if(!require(ggplot2)) install.packages('ggplot2'); library(ggplot2)

data$dollar<-gsub(",","",data$dollar)
data$dollar <- as.numeric(paste(data$dollar))

bar<- ggplot(data,aes(factor(year),dollar))
bar+geom_bar(aes(fill=factor(group)),stat='identity',position='dodge')+
   ylim(0,70000)+
    coord_flip()+
  ggtitle("Average Annual Salary\n of Teachers in Public\n Elementary and \n Secondary School")
```
